Substitution.create: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `Substitution` (`_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT 'KEY', `formKey` varchar(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `substDate` date NOT NULL, `period` varchar(7) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', `type` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'Sonstige', `lesson` varchar(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `lessonSubst` varchar(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `room` varchar(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `roomSubst` varchar(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `annotation` varchar(350) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', PRIMARY KEY (`_id`)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

Events.create: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `Events` (`_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT 'KEY', `title` varchar(350) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `eventDate` date NOT NULL, `dateString` varchar(350) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `description` varchar(350) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', PRIMARY KEY (`_id`)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

News.create: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `News` (`_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT 'KEY', `title` varchar(350) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `article` varchar(8000) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `articleUrl` varchar(350) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `imageUrl` varchar(350) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `imageDesc` varchar(350) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', PRIMARY KEY (`_id`)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

Teachers.create: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `Teachers` (`_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT 'KEY', `firstName` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `lastName` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `shorthand` varchar(5) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `subjects` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `email` varchar(100) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', PRIMARY KEY (`_id`)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
